Third Age 2941 (abbreviated to T.A. 2941) is the 2941st year of the Sun of the Third Age of Middle-earth. Third Age 2941 was also known as S.R. 1341 in Shire-reckoning.

Notable events in this year include:

content.title: March
content.content: 15: Gandalf meets Thorin near Bree and eventually decide about the Quest of Erebor.[1]

content.title: April
content.content:
6: Bilbo Baggins is out for Yestare; Gandalf visits Bag End, talks with Holman Greenhand and realises Bilbo is the right person for the Quest.[2]
Thorin and Gandalf visit Bilbo in the Shire.[3][4]
The next day Thorin and Company depart for the Green Dragon. Bilbo catches up at 11 a.m. Quest for Erebor begins.[5]

content.title: Spring-Summer
content.content:
Bilbo meets Gollum and finds the One Ring.[3]
The White Council meets.[3]
Saruman agrees to an Attack on Dol Guldur, since he now wishes to prevent Sauron from searching the Anduin.[3]
Sauron having made his plans abandons Dol Guldur.[3]

content.title: September
content.content:
Bilbo and Thorin and Company escape the Elvenking's Halls on barrels.
22: Bilbo's birthday; that day he arrives in Lake-town.

content.title: Later
content.content:
Bard of Esgaroth slays Smaug.[3]
The Battle of Five Armies in Dale.[3]
Death of Thorin Oakenshield, Fíli, and Kíli.[3]
Death of Bolg.[6]
Dáin II Ironfoot of the Iron Hills becomes King under the Mountain.[3]

content.title: Unknown
content.content:
Birth of Tolman Cotton, first child and son of Holman Cotton.[7]
Death of Hildigrim Took.[8]
